a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Employment rate with tertiary vs. vocational education, 2016
Employment rates for 25-34 year-olds with a teritary education vs employment rates with an upper secondary or
post-secondary non-tertiary vocational education. For more information see the sources tab.
Data source: Education at a Glance 2017: OECD Indicators (2017)
